description: T.L.Signal (short for "Traffic Light Signal") is the band of keyboarder http://anidb.net/ch5899 [Kojima Jun`ichi], guitarist / songwriter http://anidb.net/ch5898 [Hirota Shingo], and vocalist / harmonica player / lyricist http://anidb.net/ch5895 [Kamikurata Kyouta].
name: Traffic Light Signal
